db:abstract.db:para: Provides access to reviews of a Place.
This type was introduced in Qt Location 5.5.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The ReviewModel is a read-only model used to fetch reviews about a Place. The model incrementally fetches. The number of reviews which are fetched at a time is specified by the batchSize property. The total number of reviews available can be accessed via the totalCount property.
To use the ReviewModel we need a view and a delegate. In this snippet we see the setting up of a ListView with a ReviewModel model and a delegate.
The model returns data for the following roles:

db:td.db:para: The date and time that the review was posted.
The review's textual description of the place. It can be either rich (HTML based) text or plain text depending on the provider.
The language that the review is written in.
The rating that the reviewer gave to the place.
The user who contributed the review.
Attribution text which must be displayed when displaying the review.

db:section.db:title: batchSize : int
db:section.db:para: This property holds the batch size to use when fetching more reviews.

db:section.db:title: place : Place
db:section.db:para: This property holds the Place that the reviews are for.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] totalCount : int
db:section.db:para: This property holds the total number of reviews for the place.
